overview: While searching for purpose in continuing their creative venture known as KDTV, Kamil finds out Caleb has been secretly trying to destroy everything they have worked for from the inside out. To ensure the collaboration of KDTV, Kamil and Caleb must air out their differences once and for all.
tagline: THEY STARTED IT, NOW THEY WILL FIGHT EACH OTHER TO SAVE IT.
title: Battle Of The Creators
